title: Team LF D1/Challenger Support
body:
Hi,

I am the head coach over at hash1gaming a new organization that started little under a year ago.
We picked up a diamond 5-3 team three months ago and grew them into a challenger team who finished 9th in open ladder and took games off OPL teams.
We are currently holding trials for our new team which we will help grow to be the next OPL team.

We have two coaches and three analysts so you will have all the help you need to improve as a player and a team.

We are currently looking for a support main. 

Must be: 
Diamond1/Challenger soloq
Age 17 or higher.

For more info add me ingame: H1 Mushi

replies.body: Hi i am support main but i am plat could you guys train me? IGN: Thuy
I am platinium but I know iPlayheaps and i deserve to be lcs, does that count?
Hi Muska i is a serious pplayer lft i play annie gg
